description: This file contains inline utility functions for file synchronization and JSON settings persistence within a namespace Utils, including file operations and JSON serialization.

methods.name: void syncPersistFile(const string file)
methods.description: Synchronizes the file on disk by opening, flushing, and calling fsync on the specified file.

methods.name: void persistJsonSettings(const string strFile,const string strKey,const JsonValue & jsValue)
methods.description: Persists JSON settings to a file, updating specific JSON key-value pairs and ensuring the file is synchronized to disk.

ctags.name: persistJsonSettings
ctags.pattern: /^inline void persistJsonSettings(const string strFile, const string strKey, const JsonValue& jsVa/
ctags.signature: (const string strFile,const string strKey,const JsonValue & jsValue)
